page.title: 16BURRA CHURCHES
page.content: THE BAPTIST CHURCH WAS BUILT IN 1792. THEN, 12 YEARS LATER A NEW CHURCH WAS BUILT NEXT TO THE MANCE WHICH WAS BUILT IN 1897.THE FIRST MINISTER WAS JOHN INKSTER,WHO WAS THE MINISTER FOR 55 YEARS.THEN SCOTT GRAY,WHO DIED AT SEA IN A FISHING ACCIDENT. THE CHURCH FUNCTIONS LIKE THIS.THE MINISTER IS CALLED BY MEMBERS.THE CHURCH HAS BIBLE STUDY, PRAYER,WORSHIP,SUNDAY SCHOOL AND LADIES MEETING.THERE IS 54 MEMBERS. MR SMITH IS THE MINISTER OF THE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND IN BURRA.HE HOLDS FAMILY SERVICES ON SUNDAYS,MONDAYS AND DURING THE WEEK THERE IS A WOMENS MEETING THE CONGREGATION HAS REMAINED THE SAME OVER THE YEARS. THERE IS AN INTER- DE- NOMINATIONAL SUNDAY SCHOOL.
